data.title: Verdux
data.description: Ceramic mug with vintage Christmas design and 280 ml capacity. With special branding area at the front. Presented in an attractive individual kraft box.

similar.title: Brincio
similar.description: Eco-friendly ball pen manufactured in recycled aluminum, whose origin lies in the almost infinite reuse of one of the materials with the greatest potential for recyclability, while retaining its original properties. This factor makes it an eco-friendly material of recycled origin and easily recyclable. In addition, the residues obtained during the recycling process can be recovered to obtain new reusable resources, consuming less energy in its manufacturing phase, among other sustainability factors. Push-button mechanism, and available in a wide range of metallic colors, with gunmetal finish accessories. Metallic clip, blue ink and recycled aluminum logo on the upper part of the ball pen. GRS (Global Recycled Standard) certification, guaranteeing the recycled origin of the material used to manufacture the product.

data.title: Teils

similar.title: Brincio
similar.description: Eco-friendly ball pen manufactured in recycled aluminum, whose origin lies in the almost infinite reuse of one of the materials with the greatest potential for recyclability, while retaining its original properties. This factor makes it an eco-friendly material of recycled origin and easily recyclable. In addition, the residues obtained during the recycling process can be recovered to obtain new reusable resources, consuming less energy in its manufacturing phase, among other sustainability factors. Push-button mechanism, and available in a wide range of metallic colors, with gunmetal finish accessories. Metallic clip, blue ink and recycled aluminum logo on the upper part of the ball pen. GRS (Global Recycled Standard) certification, guaranteeing the recycled origin of the material used to manufacture the product.

Steel is one of the most demanded materials and can be found almost everywhere, from everyday products to major constructions. With countless properties, including durability and a high level of reusability, it is a much valued alternative for sustainable solutions. Properly treated, new resources of infinite use can be obtained.

similar.title: Niyel
similar.description: Original and compact USB hub in rounded shape and bicolor design. With 4 USB 2.0 ports to connect multiple devices, and especially designed for pad printing or digital printing. Presented in an individual box.

similar.title: Slatham
similar.description: Selfie stick with battery of 2.200 mAh charging capacity anchored to the handle and easily removable for recharging -included micro USB cable-. Compatible with any type of smartphone, with a stainless steel folding pole with anti-rotation system and shooter in handle. 3.5mm jack connection and a system of pads in the bracket to offer an optimal adjustment and protection of the smartphone. Adjustment nut to fix according to the desired shooting angle, in order to make selfies even more varied and fun. With matching color accessories and a large printing surface on the back of the smartphone holder. Presented in an attractive design box. The capacities shown in all our external auxiliary batteries are real, all of them incorporating non-recycled, grade A batteries, with a service life of at least 500 charging cycles, and complying with CE regulations. In addition, they are manufactured according RoHS standards, and in compliance with the following safety requirements: Power bank overcharge protection system. Complete discharge protection system, which increases the durability of the power bank. Blocking system to prevent short circuits. Constant charging transfer system, in accordance with the capacity of the target device.

similar.description: Original and compact USB hub in rounded shape and bicolor design. With 4 USB 2.0 ports to connect multiple devices, and especially designed for pad printing or digital printing. Presented in an individual box.

similar.title: Slatham
similar.description: Selfie stick with battery of 2.200 mAh charging capacity anchored to the handle and easily removable for recharging -included micro USB cable-. Compatible with any type of smartphone, with a stainless steel folding pole with anti-rotation system and shooter in handle. 3.5mm jack connection and a system of pads in the bracket to offer an optimal adjustment and protection of the smartphone. Adjustment nut to fix according to the desired shooting angle, in order to make selfies even more varied and fun. With matching color accessories and a large printing surface on the back of the smartphone holder. Presented in an attractive design box. The capacities shown in all our external auxiliary batteries are real, all of them incorporating non-recycled, grade A batteries, with a service life of at least 500 charging cycles, and complying with CE regulations. In addition, they are manufactured according RoHS standards, and in compliance with the following safety requirements: Power bank overcharge protection system. Complete discharge protection system, which increases the durability of the power bank. Blocking system to prevent short circuits. Constant charging transfer system, in accordance with the capacity of the target device.

data.title: Gliter
data.description: Resistant, anti-bacterial bottle made of PE material with a white finish. 600 ml capacity, with stainless steel screw cap - BPA free - and comfortable carrying strap. Products with antibacterial treatments are able to drastically reduce the bacterial levels present on the surfaces of the materials, thanks to the addition of permanent static microbial agents, with high effectiveness in inhibiting and preventing bacterial contamination. Item according to the ISO 22196 standard, which determines the antibacterial activity in plastic materials and non-porous surfaces. This allows us to know the effectiveness of microbial inhibition that additives have on treated objects by means of a quantitave evaluation.

data.title: Plantex
data.description: Antibacterial mug in resistant PP material with a solid finishing and BPA free. 350 ml capacity, presented in an individual bag.  roducts with antibacterial treatments are able to drastically reduce the bacterial levels present on the surfaces of the materials, thanks to the addition of permanent static microbial agents, with high effectiveness in inhibiting and preventing bacterial contamination.  Item according to the ISO 22196 standard, which determines the antibacterial activity in plastic materials and non-porous surfaces. This allows us to know the effectiveness of microbial inhibition that additives have on treated objects by means of a quantitave evaluation.

similar.title: Livor
similar.description: 5W wireless charger of nature line and circular design. Case in combination of natural cork and wheat straw materials. similar.title: Merak
similar.description: External nature line auxiliary battery with integrated 5W wireless charger. Housing in combination of natural cork and wheat straw materials. 5,000 mAh capacity and charge status indicator. Double USB output and Type C input. With large printing surface and presented in an attractive eco design box.   The capacities shown in all our external auxiliary batteries are real, all of them incorporating non-recycled, grade A batteries, with a service life of at least 500 charging cycles, and complying with CE regulations.   In addition, they are manufactured according RoHS standards, and in compliance with the following safety requirements:  Power bank overcharge protection system.  Complete discharge protection system, which increases the durability of the power bank.  Blocking system to prevent short circuits.  Constant charging transfer system, in accordance with the capacity of the target device.

data.title: Koton
data.description: Antibacterial cup in resistant PP material with a solid finishing and BPA free. 450 ml capacity, with security doses lid. Presented in an individual bag.  Products with antibacterial treatments are able to drastically reduce the bacterial levels present on the surfaces of the materials, thanks to the addition of permanent static microbial agents, with high effectiveness in inhibiting and preventing bacterial contamination.  Item according to the ISO 22196 standard, which determines the antibacterial activity in plastic materials and non-porous surfaces. This allows us to know the effectiveness of microbial inhibition that additives have on treated objects by means of a quantitave evaluation.
